This document details working with Salmon data obtained from analysis of the dbGaP rnaseq EwS cohort.

## Setting up the environment

These are packages you will need for this notebook. For exact versions used, please refer to the session info at the bottom of this notebook.


## Data processing

The first thing to do is to make a sample annotation table.

```{r}
##########################################################################################
samples = tibble('tissue' = rep('EwS',92),
                 'sample' = c(paste('SRR5163',seq(665,711,1),sep=''),
                              paste('SRR5163',seq(713,757,1),sep='')))
```

<div style="margin-bottom:50px;"></div>

Next we point at our quant files.

```{r}
##########################################################################################
quantFiles = file.path(paste(baseRepository, '/sequencing20211120_ewsCohortDbgapPmid25010205/quants', sep = ''), samples$sample, 'quant.sf')
names(quantFiles) = samples$sample
all(file.exists(quantFiles))
```

<div style="margin-bottom:50px;"></div>

Build the transcriptome index.

```{r}
##########################################################################################
txdb = makeTxDbFromGFF('D:/databases/projectEwsDlg2/baseGenomeFiles/genome.gtf')
k = keys(txdb, keytype = "TXNAME")
tx2gene = select(txdb, k, c("GENEID", "TXSTART", "TXEND"), "TXNAME")
```

<div style="margin-bottom:50px;"></div>

Read the transcript data.

```{r}
##########################################################################################
txi = tximport(quantFiles, type = 'salmon', tx2gene = tx2gene, countsFromAbundance = 'lengthScaledTPM')
names(txi)
txiAnnotated = tibble(as.data.frame(txi$counts)) %>%
  mutate('ENSEMBL' = sub('(.*)\\.[0-9]+$', '\\1', row.names(txi$counts)))
```

<div style="margin-bottom:50px;"></div>

Make a plot of these data.

```{r}
##########################################################################################
geneSymbols = select(org.Hs.eg.db, txiAnnotated$ENSEMBL, c('ENSEMBL','SYMBOL'), 'ENSEMBL') 
geneExpData = txiAnnotated %>%
  left_join(geneSymbols) %>%
  mutate(symbol = SYMBOL)

##
targetGenes = c('CNMD')
targetData = geneExpData %>%
  dplyr::filter(symbol %in% targetGenes) %>%
  tidyr::pivot_longer(cols = SRR5163671:SRR5163757, names_to = 'accession', values_to = 'tpm') %>%
  dplyr::select(symbol,accession,tpm) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(tpm = log2(tpm + 1))

##
ggplot(targetData, aes(symbol, tpm, fill = symbol)) +
  geom_violin(size = 0.5, color = brewer.pal(3,'Greys')[3]) +
  geom_point(size = 0.5, color = brewer.pal(3,'Greys')[3]) +
  labs(x = 'gene symbol', y = 'log2(TPM + 1)', title = 'CNMD in EwS cohort') +
  scale_fill_manual(values = rep(brewer.pal(3,'OrRd')[3],6)) +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(legend.position = 'none')
ggsave(paste(baseRepository, '/sequencing20211109_ewsCohortDbgapPmid25010205/scatter_cnmdAcrossCohort.pdf', sep = ''),
      height = 2, width = 2, useDingbats = FALSE)
```
